content: chain from hook half_double_crochet 36 across in back bump pic 1 row 2-4 chain 1 turn half_double_crochet across pause to measure and confirm gauge the long edge should be within 1/2 of 18 row 5-6 chain 1 turn single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 34 single_crochet 1 row 7-8 chain 1 turn single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 32 single_crochet 2 row 9-11 chain 1 turn single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet 30 single_crochet 3 row 12-14 chain 1 turn single_crochet 4 half_double_crochet 28 single_crochet 4 part 2 edging and ties - chain 1 rotate 90 degrees and work across short edge pic 2 *single_crochet decrease repeat from * across approximately 10-11 stitches this is part of the neckline your last stitch will go into the corner - chain 27 slip_stitch in second chain from hook and back down chain - single_crochet in same corner space that you started the chain from counts as first stitch you ll now be working across the front of the bonnet single_crochet 35 single_crochet 1 - chain 27 slip_stitch in second chain from hook and back down chain - single_crochet in same corner space that you started the chain from you ll now be working across the other half of the neckline continue on across the short edge *single_crochet decrease repeat from * across approximately 10-11 stitches the right side is facing you now - fold bonnet in half bringing short edges together make sure the right sides are facing in towards each other pic 3 - join sides together with slip_stitch pic 3 - single_crochet back of bonnet together or cut a long tail and sew it together - sew in ends turn inside out and enjoy - continue on to page 13 if you re adding ears boyd pixie bonnet pattern - yarn republic 12 ears increase = 2 stitches in the same space newborn 0-3 m and 3-6 m row 1 chain 2 in second chain from hook double_crochet 6 or magic loop with 6dc 6 row 2 turn chain 1 single_crochet increase repeat 2 more times 9 cut long tail for sewing 6-12 m and 1-2 yrs row 1 chain 2 in second chain from hook double_crochet 6 or magic loop with 6dc 6 row 2 turn chain 1 half_double_crochet increase repeat 2 more times 9 cut long tail for sewing 3-5 yrs and 6-8 yrs row 1 chain 2 in second chain from hook double_crochet 6 or magic loop with 6dc 6 row 2 turn chain 1 double_crochet increase repeat 2 more times 9 cut long tail for sewing attaching use your stitch markers to mark where each side of the ears will be sewn where you place them is more of a personal preference but i usually aim for about 2/3 way up and between row 2 & 4 for the newborn size and between row 4 & 6 for all other sizes the ears will stretch across 4 4 4 5 5 6 6 stitches boyd pixie bonnet pattern -
